actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To direct the President to assess the advisability of requiring each State to use the Death Master File of the Social Security Administration in issuing drivers' licenses to individuals.

summary.text: Secure Identity Protection Act - Directs the President to assess and report to Congress on the advisability of requiring each State to use the Death Master File of the Social Security Administration in issuing drivers' licenses to individuals as a method of determining the validity of the social security numbers supplied by the individuals.

titles.title: To direct the President to assess the advisability of requiring each State to use the Death Master File of the Social Security Administration in issuing drivers' licenses to individuals.
